item.title: PennCloud: Distributed Cloud Platform
item.author: Author
item.description: This repository contains implementation of a distributed software system. The goal is to design a small clone of Google Apps that primary consists of just two key apps: webmail and storage (similar to Gmail and Google Drive) and leaves out other fancy optics. The key components includes a web frontend and a key-value store backend. This work was done in collaboration with Thomas Donnelly, Katrina Ashton, and Jacob Glenn. Design A basic session consists of a client connecting to our load balancer and getting redirected to a running frontend server.
